item.title: english/proverb
item.description: References https://lemongrad.com/proverbs-with-meanings-and-examples/ Proverb A bad workman always blames his tools. A bird in hand is worth two in the bush. Absense makes the heart grow fonder. A cat has nine lives. A chain is only as strong as its weakest link. Actions speak louder than words. A drowning man will clutch at a straw. Adversity and loss make a main wise. A fool and his mony are soon parted.
